channel.title: [NFoL] Newbie Forum of Lies 3 - The Blue Dragon Are Victorious!
channel.description:
# Welcome to Forum of Lies!
# General Gameplay Information
Hosts are Geyde and Solic
## Rules
1. Follow the Global Forum Rules 2. If you haven’t posted content in 24 hours, you’ll be prodded for inactivity. If you don’t respond to that prod in 12 hours, you will be force replaced. 3. No private messaging others in the game about the game. 4. Do not quote private host messages. This includes copy pasting, directly translating, or using the forum quote feature. If the host sent you something and you want to say something about it in thread, please paraphrase. 5. Don’t throw the game. This includes any form of intent to make you or your faction lose. 6. Do NOT spam thread with non-game related content. 7. Players are not allowed to use big letters. These are reserved for the host. 9. Lets all have fun and play together! 10. Do not edit or delete made posts. 11. Do not like posts in a thread if you are dead in that game.
## Gameplay
* Days last 48 hours, or until a majority is reached for execution. Nights last 24 hours. * Day 1 lasts 24 hours and will not have an execution. * All actions must be sent to the mod. * Unseen/Cult will talk through a special Discord server or forum message. * The priest will speak with the dead through a separate Discord server or forum message. * All classes will be used and will be used as they are found in the Class Cards Thread.
## Executions
* To accuse someone say “/accuse [player]” or “/vote [player]” (Host tip: Ping using @Geyde for voting so we can track the votes) * Should the votes reach the majority, that player will be executed and the day will end.
## Picking a New King
* If there are less than 4 players a new king will not be selected. * When the king dies a 12 hour period starts. In this, players may vote in their class PM for who they want to become the next king. * Whoever receives the most votes in this period will be crowned king. If votes are tied, a king election will be held the next day to determine it.
## Action Results
## [Feedback List ](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/forum-of-lies-hosting-feedback-guide/75082)
## Logs
* PM the host what you want on your journal. When you die, the last update to your journal will be revealed to everyone
## Deathnotes
* There are no deathnotes for BD killer classes. Neutral Killers and Unseen/Cult kills may use deathnotes, if they so wish.
### Rolelist: **King** **(65% <font color="steblue">Good</font>, 35% <font color="purple">Evil</font> / <font color="darkred">Devout</font>)** **[color=purple]Mastermind[/color] / [color=darkred]Cult Leader[/color]** **[color=purple]Assassin[/color] / [color=darkred]Random Cult[/color]** **[color=steblue]Prince[/color]** **[color=steblue]Random Blue Dragon[/color]** **[color=steblue]Random Blue Dragon[/color]** **[color=steblue]Random Blue Dragon[/color]** **[color=steblue]Random Blue Dragon[/color]** **[color=steblue]Random Blue Dragon[/color]** **[color=steblue]Random Blue Dragon[/color]** **[color=steblue]Random Blue Dragon[/color]** **[color=steblue]Random Blue Dragon[/color]** **[color=steblue]Random Blue Dragon[/color]** **[color=steblue]Random Blue Dragon[/color]** / **[color=grey]Random Neutral Non-Killer [/color]** **[color=grey]Random Neutral Non-Killer[/color]** **[color=grey]Neutral Killer[/color]**
## [Roles ](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fol-class-cards-now-officially-official/1998)
## Playerlist
1. ~~WazzaAzza (VET)~~ / Frostwolf103 (VET) :crown: 2. Cheeki - Died N2 as [color=solblue]**The Butler**[/color] 3. Sulit 4. Possessed 5. Fireslol 6. James 7. ~~LadyThamasa / Datbird (VET)~~ Died N3 as [color=darkred]**The Seeker**[/color] 8. What 9. ~~Gikkle~~ / EndOfTheWorld 10. ~~Eevee (VET) / Magnus~~ Lynched D4 as [color=black]**The Reaper**[/color] 11. MrEevee7 12. ~~Andrej~~ - Died N2 as [color=solblue]**The Good King**[/color] 13. ~~Marcus_Doodalee (VET)~~ Lynched D3 as [color=darkred]**The Cult Leader**[/color] 14. ~~BlueStorm (VET)~~ - **[color=red]MODKILLED[/color]** N2 as [color=red]**The Scorned**[/color] 15. Priestess (VET) 16. ~~Mathblade (VET)~~ - Died N1 as [color=solblue]**The Noble**[/color]
### Timestamp:
[Start of D2](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/nfol-newbie-forum-of-lies-3-day-3-regicide/77064/400) [Start of D3](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/nfol-newbie-forum-of-lies-3-day-3-regicide/77064/1010)
### Backups:
1. Boss110 2. Shurian 3. Icibalus
### Spectators:
1. Htm

item.dc:creator: anon97870008
item.description:
Hunters Mark requires two people. The first one has to visit the second one. If the first visits the second, the first one will be attacked (and not occupied interestingly). Doesn’t bypass immunities.

Read full topic

Also I just read up: @Frostwolf103 I was occed so my last night results are invalid. Not saying you were wrong, but your train of thought was incorrect since if I was occed on a HM, Fireslol wouldn’t have died on James.

Read full topic

item.source: [NFoL] Newbie Forum of Lies 3 - The Blue Dragon Are Victorious!

item.title: [NFoL] Newbie Forum of Lies 3 - The Blue Dragon Are Victorious!
item.dc:creator: Solic
item.description:
Possessed:

Watch the vote counts guys so we don’t slam early, but ill bleed someone if you still want me too. I’d be hard pressed to believe Eevee is actually a hunter with the way he’s been acting, but if he is…that’s 2 BD we will lose before tomorrow. If Sulit isn’t lying about his bleed, that’s 3 dead BD and another bleeding on convert night.

That will leave Prince, King, What, Gikkle, Fireslol and Priestess left. 3 of the 4 could have majority.

Potential teams right now:

Mr Eevee and pretty much anyone.
Sulit and anyone.
What and Fireslol.
Priestess and anyone.
Gikkle and anyone.

What clearing Fireslol means they are likely the same team, whether cult or BD. What could have went for an aggressive frame but didn’t which makes me believe him most.

Gikkle was believed to be S/I from What. Its possible this is seeker-to-CL, and Gikkle hasn’t provided any info to exonerate Gikkle. Also could be a potential convert.

Fireslol was cleared by What, so if What is BD, Fireslol is also cleared.

Priestess claims healer. Its not a confirmable class, but she would be immune to bleeds so this is obviously a hunter target for bleed test.

If Sulit is anything, he was converted. I don’t believe this is starting Cult, but if the bleed is real…Sulit would die tomorrow night unless Priestess is real and healed him or he faked the bleed. Potential play for a Sulit/Priestess scum team.

Mr Eevee is my obvious pick. In the event that he is cult, I think Gikkle would be the most likely convert.

This you really reallyyyyy had to follow up with a vote and a more clear focus. You can’t outpassive your way out of several votes on you. Just some advice and something that caught my eye.

You were occupy immune, so all you had to do was live through this day unfortunately.

Read full topic
